visual_truth_engine.description: Real-time visualization of ledger state with risk overlays

ai_risk_layer.description: Automated anomaly detection and fraud scoring

user_stories_completed: As an auditor, I can view the complete history of an asset
As an admin, I can see fraud risk scores for each block
As a viewer, I can browse the ledger without modification rights
As any user, I can see my actions logged in the audit trail

acceptance_criteria_met.immutability: ✅ Blocks cannot be modified after creation
acceptance_criteria_met.risk_visibility: ✅ AI scores displayed on each block
